You're getting pretty good at that!$h"/viewport move 0 -1 4000/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Leo 0 true/pause 1000/playMusic sad_kid/pause 4000/speak Leo "Sometimes I wonder how different my life would be if I had never washed up on this island...$s"/pause 3000/speak Leo "Back home, I didn't really care about birds. I never thought to listen to what they might be saying.$s"/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/pause 2000/speak Leo "Though I guess that's normal for... normal kids.$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 1 true/pause 1000/speak Leo "I wonder what... normal kids would have to say about me...$s"/pause 1000/emote Leo 40/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2 true/pause 500/speak Leo "Do you think I could ever be a normal kid again?$s"/question null "#Yes#No#Maybe..."/pause 1000/speak Leo "Hmmm... I guess you're right.$u"/speak Leo "Though living on this island has given me a lot of experiences normal kids would never have.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 0 true/pause 500/speak Leo "If it weren't for the parrots... who knows what would have happened to me."/pause 500/emote Leo 32/pause 500/speak Leo "I'm happy I met them. I'll always consider them to be my family, even if that makes me a little strange.$h"/pause 500/viewport move 0 1 4000/pause 100/faceDirection Leo 2 true/move Leo 0 1 2/pause 250/faceDirection Leo 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 3000/speak Leo "Anyways, thanks for talking to me, @."/pause 500/speak Leo "Maybe some day, you can be a part of our family too, hehe.$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Leo 2 true/pause 1000/speak Leo "Here, let me teach you how to say "Let's play" in parrot talk!"/pause 500/viewport move 0 1 99999/pause 500/playSound parrot/animate Leo false false 1000 17/shake Leo 1000/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/playSound parrot/pause 250/stopJittering/globalFade/viewport -5000 -5000/end
